# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Clown [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Clown is responsible for entertaining the crew. The Honkmother has blessed them with the ability to make people laugh. The station provides many tools for larks and tomfoolery.
## Do - Entertain the crew. - Decide whether to fued or form an alliance with the Mime.
## Don't - Use the role as an excuse to be a shitter. - No seriously, do not use the role as an excuse to be a shitter.
